div.head: A Christian prayer for the adversaries of true Religion.

p.hi: MErciful God, who hast made all men, and hatest nothing that thou hast made, nor wouldest the death of a sinner, but rather that hee should bee converted and live, have mercy upon all lewes, Turkes, Infidels and Heretikes, and take from them all ignorance, hardnesse of heart, and contempt of thy word, and so fetch them home (blessed Lord) to thy flocke, that they may bee saved among the remnant of the true Israelites, and bee made one f • ld • nderone sleepheard, Iesus Christ our Lord, who liveth and reigneth with thee and the holy Ghost, now and ever. Amen.
